long_description: The Columbia Chiliwack shell pants give you an edge in your winter endeavors with sturdy waterproof construction. Omni-Tech(R) waterproof, breathable protection with fully sealed seams keeps you warm and dry. Nylon shell fabric wicks away moisture to reduce chilling condensation buildup on the inside. Adjustable waist lets you dial down the fit; zip and snap waist for easy on/off. Half leg side zips and snap closure at the bottom offer venting and easy on and off. Articulated knees ease comfort and boost range of motion. Columbia Chiliwack pants sport internal, adjustable leg gaiters to prevent snow from sneaking in. Waterproof zip handwarmer pockets and a security pocket keep small essentials close by.
short_description: The Columbia Chiliwack shell pants give you an edge in your winter endeavors with sturdy waterproof construction.
